com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.crud

类 ClusterQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.crud.ClusterQuery

  • public class ClusterQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows developers to query tables with cluster style.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.1

    • 方法详细资料

      • select

        public ClusterQuery select(java.lang.String... columns)
        Declaring to query which columns in table. 
         DataSupport.select("name", "age").find(Person.class);
        This will find all rows with name and age columns in Person table.
        参数:
        columns - A String array of which columns to return. Passing null will return all columns.
        返回:
        A ClusterQuery instance.

      • where

        public ClusterQuery where(java.lang.String... conditions)
        Declaring to query which rows in table. 
         DataSupport.where("name = ? or age > ?", "Tom", "14").find(Person.class);
        This will find rows which name is Tom or age greater than 14 in Person table.
        参数:
        conditions - A filter declaring which rows to return, formatted as an SQL WHERE clause. Passing null will return all rows.
        返回:
        A ClusterQuery instance.

      • order

        public ClusterQuery order(java.lang.String column)
        Declaring how to order the rows queried from table. 
         DataSupport.order("name desc").find(Person.class);
        This will find all rows in Person table sorted by name with inverted order.
        参数:
        column - How to order the rows, formatted as an SQL ORDER BY clause. Passing null will use the default sort order, which may be unordered.
        返回:
        A ClusterQuery instance.

      • limit

        public ClusterQuery limit(int value)
        Limits the number of rows returned by the query. 
         DataSupport.limit(2).find(Person.class);
        This will find the top 2 rows in Person table.
        参数:
        value - Limits the number of rows returned by the query, formatted as LIMIT clause.
        返回:
        A ClusterQuery instance.

      • offset

        public ClusterQuery offset(int value)
        Declaring the offset of rows returned by the query. This method must be used with limit(int), or nothing will return. 
         DataSupport.limit(1).offset(2).find(Person.class);
        This will find the third row in Person table.
        参数:
        value - The offset amount of rows returned by the query.
        返回:
        A ClusterQuery instance.

      • find

        public <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
        Finds multiple records by the cluster parameters. You can use the below way to finish a complicated query: 
         DataSupport.select("name").where("age > ?", "14").order("age").limit(1).offset(2)
                .find(Person.class);
        You can also do the same job with SQLiteDatabase like this: 
         getSQLiteDatabase().query("Person", "name", "age > ?", new String[] { "14" }, null, null, "age",
                "2,1");
        Obviously, the first way is much more semantic.
        Note that the associated models won't be loaded by default considering the efficiency, but you can do that by using find(Class, boolean).
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return as a list.
        返回:
        An object list with founded data from database, or an empty list.

      • find

        public <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass,
                                  boolean isEager)
        It is mostly same as find(Class) but an isEager parameter. If set true the associated models will be loaded as well.
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return as a list.
        isEager - True to load the associated models, false not.
        返回:
        An object list with founded data from database, or an empty list.

      • findFirst

        public <T> T findFirst(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
        Finds the first record by the cluster parameters. You can use the below way to finish a complicated query: 
         DataSupport.select("name").where("age > ?", "14").order("age").limit(1).offset(2)
                .findFirst(Person.class);
        Note that the associated models won't be loaded by default considering the efficiency, but you can do that by using findFirst(Class, boolean).
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return.
        返回:
        An object with founded data from database, or null.

      • findFirst

        public <T> T findFirst(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass,
                       boolean isEager)
        It is mostly same as findFirst(Class) but an isEager parameter. If set true the associated models will be loaded as well.
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return.
        isEager - True to load the associated models, false not.
        返回:
        An object with founded data from database, or null.

      • findLast

        public <T> T findLast(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
        Finds the last record by the cluster parameters. You can use the below way to finish a complicated query: 
         DataSupport.select("name").where("age > ?", "14").order("age").limit(1).offset(2)
                .findLast(Person.class);
        Note that the associated models won't be loaded by default considering the efficiency, but you can do that by using findLast(Class, boolean).
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return.
        返回:
        An object with founded data from database, or null.

      • findLast

        public <T> T findLast(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass,
                      boolean isEager)
        It is mostly same as findLast(Class) but an isEager parameter. If set true the associated models will be loaded as well.
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query and the object type to return.
        isEager - True to load the associated models, false not.
        返回:
        An object with founded data from database, or null.

      • count

        public int count(java.lang.Class<?> modelClass)
        Count the records. 
         DataSupport.count(Person.class);
        This will count all rows in person table.
        You can also specify a where clause when counting. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").count(Person.class);
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query from by class.
        返回:
        Count of the specified table.

      • count

        public int count(java.lang.String tableName)
        Count the records. 
         DataSupport.count("person");
        This will count all rows in person table.
        You can also specify a where clause when counting. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").count("person");
        参数:
        tableName - Which table to query from.
        返回:
        Count of the specified table.

      • average

        public double average(java.lang.Class<?> modelClass,
                      java.lang.String column)
        Calculates the average value on a given column. 
         DataSupport.average(Person.class, "age");
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").average(Person.class, "age");
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query from by class.
        column - The based on column to calculate.
        返回:
        The average value on a given column.

      • average

        public double average(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String column)
        Calculates the average value on a given column. 
         DataSupport.average("person", "age");
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").average("person", "age");
        参数:
        tableName - Which table to query from.
        column - The based on column to calculate.
        返回:
        The average value on a given column.

      • max

        public <T> T max(java.lang.Class<?> modelClass,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the maximum value on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column. 
         DataSupport.max(Person.class, "age", int.class);
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").max(Person.class, "age", Integer.TYPE);
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query from by class.
        columnName - The based on column to calculate.
        columnType - The type of the based on column.
        返回:
        The maximum value on a given column.

      • max

        public <T> T max(java.lang.String tableName,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the maximum value on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column. 
         DataSupport.max("person", "age", int.class);
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").max("person", "age", Integer.TYPE);
        参数:
        tableName - Which table to query from.
        columnName - The based on column to calculate.
        columnType - The type of the based on column.
        返回:
        The maximum value on a given column.

      • min

        public <T> T min(java.lang.Class<?> modelClass,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the minimum value on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column. 
         DataSupport.min(Person.class, "age", int.class);
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").min(Person.class, "age", Integer.TYPE);
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query from by class.
        columnName - The based on column to calculate.
        columnType - The type of the based on column.
        返回:
        The minimum value on a given column.

      • min

        public <T> T min(java.lang.String tableName,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the minimum value on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column. 
         DataSupport.min("person", "age", int.class);
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").min("person", "age", Integer.TYPE);
        参数:

        columnName - The based on column to calculate.
        columnType - The type of the based on column.

      • sum

        public <T> T sum(java.lang.Class<?> modelClass,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the sum of values on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column. 
         DataSupport.sum(Person.class, "age", int.class);
        You can also specify a where clause when calculating. 
         DataSupport.where("age > ?", "15").sum(Person.class, "age", Integer.TYPE);
        参数:
        modelClass - Which table to query from by class.
        columnName - The based on column to calculate.
        columnType - The type of the based on column.
        返回:
        The sum value on a given column.

      • sum

        public <T> T sum(java.lang.String tableName,
                 java.lang.String columnName,
                 java.lang.Class<T> columnType)
        Calculates the sum of values on a given column. The value is returned with the same data type of the column.
